function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interactions between COVID-19, housing policies, and green housing demand","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and reduced effectiveness of green housing analysis","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures in green buildings, and analyze the impact of housing policies on COVID-19 transmission","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air filtration systems, building occupancy management tools","People":"Residents, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Health authorities, building owners, researchers"},{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive analysis of COVID-19, green building life cycle, and external environments","Impact":"Ineffective green building analysis and failure to address COVID-19 related challenges","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive analysis integrating COVID-19, green building life cycle, and external environments","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, simulation software, remote sensing technologies","People":"Researchers, data analysts, green building stakeholders","Owner":"Research institutions, green building organizations"},{"Description":"Reliability of the hypothetical relationship between COVID-19, housing policies, and green housing demands","Impact":"Unreliable research outcomes and flawed policy decisions","Mitigation":"Enhance research design and statistical analysis methods to ensure reliability of findings","Technologies":"Advanced statistical analysis software, research design software, data validation tools","People":"Scholars, researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
